name: hobgoblin
traits_and_actions:
Senses
darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10
Languages
Common, Goblin
Martial advantage.
Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn’t incapacitated.
Actions
Longsword.
Melee weapon attack:
+3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit:
5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.
Longbow.
Ranged weapon attack:
+3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target.
Hit:
5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
